subject: I RECEIVED A PHONE CALL DAY BE
body:
I RECEIVED A PHONE CALL DAY BEING1TH OF OCT  2014 FROM A WOMAN
NAMED MRS.SARAH KELLY CALLED ME ABOUT 4 TIMES WITH THIS TELEPHONE NUMBER (246-862-3150 ) AND THIS IS HER ADDRESS 80 HUNTINGTON ST. SPC. 649, HUNTINGTON BEACH ,CA. 92648 INFORMING ME THAT YOU ARE DEAD AND SHE SAID THAT I SHOULD TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS TO HIS BANK ACCOUNT IN USA BECAUSE SHE IS YOUR NEXT OF KIN TO YOUR FUNDS OF $15.5MILLION USD, AND SHE ALSO TOLD ME THAT YOU INSTRUCTED HIM TO CLAIM YOUR PROPERTIES INCLUDING YOUR MONEY IN CASH BECAUSE YOU ARE NO MORE TO BE FOUND ON EARTH.
WELL,I'M TOTALLY CONFUSED OVER HERE. I'M VERY SORRY TO HEAR THAT YOU ARE NO MORE TO BE FOUND ON EARTH AND I DON'T KNOW THAT THIS IS THE REASON WHY YOU  HAVE NOT REPLY THE EMAILS I SENT TO YOU REGARDING THE TRANSFER OF YOUR  FUND  OF $15.5MILLION USD WHICH IS READY OVER TWO WEEKS NOW. THIS IS MY PROMISE TO YOU THAT I AM GOING TO DO EVERYTHING WITHIN MY POWER TO MAKE SURE THAT YOUR FUND WILL BE TRANSFER TO HIM AS YOUR NEXT OF KIN TO YOUR $15.5MILLION USD? SO MAY YOUR SOUL REST IN PERFECT PEACE AND MAY GOD GRANT YOU INTERNAL LIFE ON THE LAST DAY TO COME I AM VERY VERY SORRY!!!
PLEASE I WILL LIKE TO HEAR FROM ANY BODY  FOR ME TO BE 100% SURE THAT WHAT MRS.SARAH KELLY  SAID IS TRUE? SO I'M STILL WAITING FOR A RESPOND?
FINALLY,HE IS READY TO CLEAR THE FUND   REQUESTED  AND OBTAIN AFFIDAVIT ON HIS BEHALF SO PLEASE LET SOMEONE LET US KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON.
NOW WE ARE WAITING TO HEAR FROM SOMEBODY WITHIN 24/HOURS,SO THAT I WILL GO  AHEAD ALLOWING HIM TO SEND THE $400 FOR THE TRANSFER CHARGE  OF   YOUR FUNDS
 TO HIS DIRECT BANK ACCOUNT IN USA .SO THIS IS THE ACCOUNT HE GAVE TO US WHERE WE  WILL TRANSFER THE 15.5MILLION
ACCOUNT NUMBER; 7476326447
ACCOUNT; SARAH KELLY.
ACCOUNT NUMBER ;7476326461
ACCOUNT; SARAH KELLY .
NOW HE NEED THE  INFORMATION HE WILL USE AND SEND THE TRANSFER CHARGE WHICH IS ONLY  $400 USD RIGHT NOW IS VERY URGENT.
THANKS
MAY YOUR SOUL REST IN PERFECT PEACE
YOURS SINCERELY

subject: Re: I RECEIVED A PHONE CALL DAY BE
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am very much alive and well. I have no idea who this Kelly person is, but she does not have any authority to claim my funds or properties. I did not instruct her to do so, and I am certainly not deceased.

Please disregard any further communication from this individual claiming to be my next of kin or having any association with me. 

Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention. Please ensure that my funds remain secure and do not transfer anything without my explicit consent.

Best wishes,
David
